meta.name: description
meta.value: Read the type of the countable message component and its quantity. These components are countable because they represent generic message types.

parameter.name: componentType
parameter.description: The type of the components represented as an enum.

parameter.name: componentCount
parameter.description: The number of message items represented by this component.

parameter.name: componentContext
parameter.description: Context used for dialoging about given message component

parameter.name: dialogContext
parameter.description: Conversational context used for dialoging about component. Contains context about the conversation and overall reading request
